channel.title: Showcase on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Showcase on nuaNce's blog

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: Just a list of some software I find nice to use, most are pretty minimal as well: cfm Simple and fast terminal file manager maim extremely powerful CLI screenshot tool SXIV “Simple X Image Viewer” giph Customizable and easy to use GIF recorder birch Freenode IRC client written in bash farge Finally a lightweight CLI colorpicker ungoogled-chromium Browse safely and privately, no compromises ST Simple Terminal shfm Terminal file browser written in bash epy Terminal based Ebook reader wpm Command line typing test cchat-gtk GTK+ frontend for cchat’s
